languages.text: "Ах, многоуважаемый Ульфар, ваш бы задор — да в наши края, в старый добрый Амасекус... Впрочем, в отличие от ваших братьев, завсегдатаи с Футфола такое веселье бы не пережили".
"Ah, my lord Ulfar, if only we could bring your exuberance to our good old Amasecus... Unlike your brothers, however, the regulars on Footfall would not survive such revelry."
languages.original_text: "Ах, многоуважаемый Ульфар, ваш бы задор — да в наши края, в старый добрый Амасекус... Впрочем, в отличие от ваших братьев, завсегдатаи с Футфола такое веселье бы не пережили".

traits.locale_text: "Ah, my lord Ulfar, if only we could bring your exuberance to our good old Amasecus... Unlike your brothers, however, the regulars on Footfall would not survive such revelry."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, my lord Ulfar, if only we could bring your exuberance to our good old Amasecus... Unlike your brothers, however, the regulars on Footfall would not survive such revelry."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “啊，乌尔法大人，真希望你也能把你的热情带到我们的烈酒修会……不过落脚港的常客和你的兄弟们可不一样，他们要是这么狂欢一场，估计人就要没了。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, my lord Ulfar, if only we could bring your exuberance to our good old Amasecus... Unlike your brothers, however, the regulars on Footfall would not survive such revelry."

traits.locale_text: “啊，乌尔法大人，真希望你也能把你的热情带到我们的烈酒修会……不过落脚港的常客和你的兄弟们可不一样，他们要是这么狂欢一场，估计人就要没了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Ah, seigneur Ulfar, je rêverais de voir votre exubérance à l'œuvre à l'Amasecus... Mais bon, contrairement à vos frères, les gens de Castel risqueraient de ne pas survivre à une telle fête. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, my lord Ulfar, if only we could bring your exuberance to our good old Amasecus... Unlike your brothers, however, the regulars on Footfall would not survive such revelry."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, seigneur Ulfar, je rêverais de voir votre exubérance à l'œuvre à l'Amasecus... Mais bon, contrairement à vos frères, les gens de Castel risqueraient de ne pas survivre à une telle fête. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Ah, mi señor Ulfar, ojalá pudiera traer su exuberante carácter al Amasecus... Aunque, a diferencia de sus hermanos, los parroquianos de Paso no sobrevivirían a semejante jolgorio».
languages.original_text: "Ah, my lord Ulfar, if only we could bring your exuberance to our good old Amasecus... Unlike your brothers, however, the regulars on Footfall would not survive such revelry."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, mi señor Ulfar, ojalá pudiera traer su exuberante carácter al Amasecus... Aunque, a diferencia de sus hermanos, los parroquianos de Paso no sobrevivirían a semejante jolgorio».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あー、ウルファー閣下、アンタの活力を古き良きアマセカスに持って来れれば良いんだけどね…アンタの兄弟と違って、フットフォールのお得意様はこんなお祭り騒ぎを切り抜けられないと思うよ」
languages.original_text: "Ah, my lord Ulfar, if only we could bring your exuberance to our good old Amasecus... Unlike your brothers, however, the regulars on Footfall would not survive such revelry."

traits.locale_text: 「あー、ウルファー閣下、アンタの活力を古き良きアマセカスに持って来れれば良いんだけどね…アンタの兄弟と違って、フットフォールのお得意様はこんなお祭り騒ぎを切り抜けられないと思うよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, mein Lord Ulfar, könnten wir doch Euren Überschwang nur in unser gutes altes Amasecus bringen ... Doch anders als Eure Brüder würden die Stammgäste auf Footfall ein solches Gelage nicht überleben."
languages.original_text: "Ah, my lord Ulfar, if only we could bring your exuberance to our good old Amasecus... Unlike your brothers, however, the regulars on Footfall would not survive such revelry."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, mein Lord Ulfar, könnten wir doch Euren Überschwang nur in unser gutes altes Amasecus bringen ... Doch anders als Eure Brüder würden die Stammgäste auf Footfall ein solches Gelage nicht überleben."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Ah, my lord Ulfar, if only we could bring your exuberance to our good old Amasecus... Unlike your brothers, however, the regulars on Footfall would not survive such revelry."

languages.text: "Lordum Ulfar... Coşkunu bizim Amasekus'a da bulaştırabilsek keşke. Fakat kardeşlerinin aksine Binliman'dakiler, öyle bir şenliğin altından kalkamaz."
languages.original_text: "Ah, my lord Ulfar, if only we could bring your exuberance to our good old Amasecus... Unlike your brothers, however, the regulars on Footfall would not survive such revelry."

traits.locale_text: "Ah lordum Ulfar... Sizin coşkunuzu bizim Amasekuslarımıza da bulaştırabilsek keşke. Fakat kardeşlerinizin aksine Binliman'dakiler öyle bir şenliğin altından kalkamaz."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
